about_the_game:
Overview


Supporter pack is a bundle that includes 21 hand-crafted color palettes and a badge in UI, that shows how cool you are. Purpose of this pack is to support the growth of PixiEditor and PixiEditor Organization.



  • 11 Small Palettes (up to 8 Colors)
  • 6 Medium (up to 16 Colors)
  • 4 Big (up to 32 Colors)

In total, 21 color palettes that can be found in Palette Browser.



PixiEditor Organization is an open-source project that develops PixiEditor entirely for free without any profits, we've been doing it since 2017 and Supporter Pack is our first paid product that in its core is a sign of your support, all revenue from it will go entirely to boost the development and growth of PixiEditor.

If you use PixiEditor and want create animations in it or see it on platforms like MacOS, Linux and web, Supporter Pack is the best way to make it happen.

If anyone sees your screen with supporter pack installed, they'll know how awesome person you are.

Announcing Supporter Pack!

Supporter Pack is a bundle that contains 21 handcrafted color palettes and a badge that shows how cool you are. All revenue will be directed into the development of PixiEditor, we have awesome ideas that we want to bring to life, but we need your support!
